generic.label: Automate your customer journey with n8n: An interview with Blent.ai

options.description: Any time any event is triggered (Wildcard Event)

options.name: Account Updated
options.description: Occurs whenever an account status or property has changed

options.name: Account Application.authorized
options.description: Occurs whenever a user authorizes an application. Sent to the related application only.

options.name: Account Application.deauthorized
options.description: Occurs whenever a user deauthorizes an application. Sent to the related application only.

options.name: Account External_account.created
options.description: Occurs whenever an external account is created.

options.name: Account External_account.deleted
options.description: Occurs whenever an external account is deleted.

options.name: Account External_account.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever an external account is updated.

options.name: Application Fee.created
options.description: Occurs whenever an application fee is created on a charge.

options.name: Application Fee.refunded
options.description: Occurs whenever an application fee is refunded, whether from refunding a charge or from refunding the application fee directly. This includes partial refunds.

options.name: Application Fee.refund.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever an application fee refund is updated.

options.name: Balance Available
options.description: Occurs whenever your Stripe balance has been updated (e.g., when a charge is available to be paid out). By default, Stripe automatically transfers funds in your balance to your bank account on a daily basis.

options.name: Capability Updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a capability has new requirements or a new status.

options.name: Charge Captured
options.description: Occurs whenever a previously uncaptured charge is captured.

options.name: Charge Expired
options.description: Occurs whenever an uncaptured charge expires.

options.name: Charge Failed
options.description: Occurs whenever a failed charge attempt occurs.

options.name: Charge Pending
options.description: Occurs whenever a pending charge is created.

options.name: Charge Refunded
options.description: Occurs whenever a charge is refunded, including partial refunds.

options.name: Charge Succeeded
options.description: Occurs whenever a new charge is created and is successful.

options.name: Charge Updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a charge description or metadata is updated.

options.name: Charge Dispute.closed
options.description: Occurs when a dispute is closed and the dispute status changes to lost, warning_closed, or won.

options.name: Charge Dispute.created
options.description: Occurs whenever a customer disputes a charge with their bank.

options.name: Charge Dispute.funds_reinstated
options.description: Occurs when funds are reinstated to your account after a dispute is closed. This includes partially refunded payments.

options.name: Charge Dispute.funds_withdrawn
options.description: Occurs when funds are removed from your account due to a dispute.

options.name: Charge Dispute.updated
options.description: Occurs when the dispute is updated (usually with evidence).

options.name: Charge Refund.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a refund is updated, on selected payment methods.

options.name: Checkout Session.completed
options.description: Occurs when a Checkout Session has been successfully completed.

options.name: Coupon Created
options.description: Occurs whenever a coupon is created.

options.name: Coupon Deleted
options.description: Occurs whenever a coupon is deleted.

options.name: Coupon Updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a coupon is updated.

options.name: Credit Note.created
options.description: Occurs whenever a credit note is created.

options.name: Credit Note.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a credit note is updated.

options.name: Credit Note.voided
options.description: Occurs whenever a credit note is voided.

options.name: Customer Created
options.description: Occurs whenever a new customer is created.

options.name: Customer Deleted
options.description: Occurs whenever a customer is deleted.

options.name: Customer Updated
options.description: Occurs whenever any property of a customer changes.

options.name: Customer Discount.created
options.description: Occurs whenever a coupon is attached to a customer.

options.name: Customer Discount.deleted
options.description: Occurs whenever a coupon is removed from a customer.

options.name: Customer Discount.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a customer is switched from one coupon to another.

options.name: Customer Source.created
options.description: Occurs whenever a new source is created for a customer.

options.name: Customer Source.deleted
options.description: Occurs whenever a source is removed from a customer.

options.name: Customer Source.expiring
options.description: Occurs whenever a card or source will expire at the end of the month.

options.name: Customer Source.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a source's details are changed.

options.name: Customer Subscription.created
options.description: Occurs whenever a customer is signed up for a new plan.

options.name: Customer Subscription.deleted
options.description: Occurs whenever a customer's subscription ends.

options.name: Customer Subscription.trial_will_end
options.description: Occurs three days before a subscription's trial period is scheduled to end, or when a trial is ended immediately (using trial_end=now).

options.name: Customer Subscription.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a subscription changes (e.g., switching from one plan to another, or changing the status from trial to active).

options.name: Customer Tax_id.created
options.description: Occurs whenever a tax ID is created for a customer.

options.name: Customer Tax_id.deleted
options.description: Occurs whenever a tax ID is deleted from a customer.

options.name: Customer Tax_id.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a customer's tax ID is updated.

options.name: File Created
options.description: Occurs whenever a new Stripe-generated file is available for your account.

options.name: Invoice Created
options.description: Occurs whenever a new invoice is created. To learn how webhooks can be used with this event, and how they can affect it, see Using Webhooks with Subscriptions.

options.name: Invoice Deleted
options.description: Occurs whenever a draft invoice is deleted.

options.name: Invoice Finalized
options.description: Occurs whenever a draft invoice is finalized and updated to be an open invoice.

options.name: Invoice Marked_uncollectible
options.description: Occurs whenever an invoice is marked uncollectible.

options.name: Invoice Payment_action_required
options.description: Occurs whenever an invoice payment attempt requires further user action to complete.

options.name: Invoice Payment_failed
options.description: Occurs whenever an invoice payment attempt fails, due either to a declined payment or to the lack of a stored payment method.

options.name: Invoice Payment_succeeded
options.description: Occurs whenever an invoice payment attempt succeeds.

options.name: Invoice Sent
options.description: Occurs whenever an invoice email is sent out.

options.name: Invoice Upcoming
options.description: Occurs X number of days before a subscription is scheduled to create an invoice that is automatically charged—where X is determined by your subscriptions settings. Note: The received Invoice object will not have an invoice ID.

options.name: Invoice Updated
options.description: Occurs whenever an invoice changes (e.g., the invoice amount).

options.name: Invoice Voided
options.description: Occurs whenever an invoice is voided.

options.name: Invoiceitem Created
options.description: Occurs whenever an invoice item is created.

options.name: Invoiceitem Deleted
options.description: Occurs whenever an invoice item is deleted.

options.name: Invoiceitem Updated
options.description: Occurs whenever an invoice item is updated.

options.name: Issuing Authorization.created
options.description: Occurs whenever an authorization is created.

options.name: Issuing Authorization.request
options.description: Represents a synchronous request for authorization, see Using your integration to handle authorization requests.

options.name: Issuing Authorization.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever an authorization is updated.

options.name: Issuing Card.created
options.description: Occurs whenever a card is created.

options.name: Issuing Card.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a card is updated.

options.name: Issuing Cardholder.created
options.description: Occurs whenever a cardholder is created.

options.name: Issuing Cardholder.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a cardholder is updated.

options.name: Issuing Dispute.created
options.description: Occurs whenever a dispute is created.

options.name: Issuing Dispute.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a dispute is updated.

options.name: Issuing Settlement.created
options.description: Occurs whenever an issuing settlement is created.

options.name: Issuing Settlement.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever an issuing settlement is updated.

options.name: Issuing Transaction.created
options.description: Occurs whenever an issuing transaction is created.

options.name: Issuing Transaction.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever an issuing transaction is updated.

options.name: Order Created
options.description: Occurs whenever an order is created.

options.name: Order Payment_failed
options.description: Occurs whenever an order payment attempt fails.

options.name: Order Payment_succeeded
options.description: Occurs whenever an order payment attempt succeeds.

options.name: Order Updated
options.description: Occurs whenever an order is updated.

options.name: Order Return.created
options.description: Occurs whenever an order return is created.

options.name: Payment Intent.amount_capturable_updated
options.description: Occurs when a PaymentIntent has funds to be captured. Check the amount_capturable property on the PaymentIntent to determine the amount that can be captured. You may capture the PaymentIntent with an amount_to_capture value up to the specified amount. Learn more about capturing PaymentIntents.

options.name: Payment Intent.canceled
options.description: Occurs when a PaymentIntent is canceled.

options.name: Payment Intent.created
options.description: Occurs when a new PaymentIntent is created.

options.name: Payment Intent.payment_failed
options.description: Occurs when a PaymentIntent has failed the attempt to create a source or a payment.

options.name: Payment Intent.succeeded
options.description: Occurs when a PaymentIntent has been successfully fulfilled.

options.name: Payment Intent.requires_action
options.description: Occurs when a PaymentIntent requires an action.

options.name: Payment Method.attached
options.description: Occurs whenever a new payment method is attached to a customer.

options.name: Payment Method.card_automatically_updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a card payment method's details are automatically updated by the network.

options.name: Payment Method.detached
options.description: Occurs whenever a payment method is detached from a customer.

options.name: Payment Method.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a payment method is updated via the PaymentMethod update API.

options.name: Payout Canceled
options.description: Occurs whenever a payout is canceled.

options.name: Payout Created
options.description: Occurs whenever a payout is created.

options.name: Payout Failed
options.description: Occurs whenever a payout attempt fails.

options.name: Payout Paid
options.description: Occurs whenever a payout is expected to be available in the destination account. If the payout fails, a payout.failed notification is also sent, at a later time.

options.name: Payout Updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a payout is updated.

options.name: Person Created
options.description: Occurs whenever a person associated with an account is created.

options.name: Person Deleted
options.description: Occurs whenever a person associated with an account is deleted.

options.name: Person Updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a person associated with an account is updated.

options.name: Plan Created
options.description: Occurs whenever a plan is created.

options.name: Plan Deleted
options.description: Occurs whenever a plan is deleted.

options.name: Plan Updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a plan is updated.

options.name: Product Created
options.description: Occurs whenever a product is created.

options.name: Product Deleted
options.description: Occurs whenever a product is deleted.

options.name: Product Updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a product is updated.

options.name: Radar Early_fraud_warning.created
options.description: Occurs whenever an early fraud warning is created.

options.name: Radar Early_fraud_warning.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever an early fraud warning is updated.

options.name: Recipient Created
options.description: Occurs whenever a recipient is created.

options.name: Recipient Deleted
options.description: Occurs whenever a recipient is deleted.

options.name: Recipient Updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a recipient is updated.

options.name: Reporting Report_run.failed
options.description: Occurs whenever a requested **ReportRun** failed to complete.

options.name: Reporting Report_run.succeeded
options.description: Occurs whenever a requested **ReportRun** completed succesfully.

options.name: Reporting Report_type.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a **ReportType** is updated (typically to indicate that a new day's data has come available).

options.name: Review Closed
options.description: Occurs whenever a review is closed. The review's reason field indicates why: approved, disputed, refunded, or refunded_as_fraud.

options.name: Review Opened
options.description: Occurs whenever a review is opened.

options.name: Setup Intent.canceled
options.description: Occurs when a SetupIntent is canceled.

options.name: Setup Intent.created
options.description: Occurs when a new SetupIntent is created.

options.name: Setup Intent.setup_failed
options.description: Occurs when a SetupIntent has failed the attempt to setup a payment method.

options.name: Setup Intent.succeeded
options.description: Occurs when an SetupIntent has successfully setup a payment method.

options.name: Sigma Scheduled_query_run.created
options.description: Occurs whenever a Sigma scheduled query run finishes.

options.name: Sku Created
options.description: Occurs whenever a SKU is created.

options.name: Sku Deleted
options.description: Occurs whenever a SKU is deleted.

options.name: Sku Updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a SKU is updated.

options.name: Source Canceled
options.description: Occurs whenever a source is canceled.

options.name: Source Chargeable
options.description: Occurs whenever a source transitions to chargeable.

options.name: Source Failed
options.description: Occurs whenever a source fails.

options.name: Source Mandate_notification
options.description: Occurs whenever a source mandate notification method is set to manual.

options.name: Source Refund_attributes_required
options.description: Occurs whenever the refund attributes are required on a receiver source to process a refund or a mispayment.

options.name: Source Transaction.created
options.description: Occurs whenever a source transaction is created.

options.name: Source Transaction.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a source transaction is updated.

options.name: Subscription Schedule.aborted
options.description: Occurs whenever a subscription schedule is canceled due to the underlying subscription being canceled because of delinquency.

options.name: Subscription Schedule.canceled
options.description: Occurs whenever a subscription schedule is canceled.

options.name: Subscription Schedule.completed
options.description: Occurs whenever a new subscription schedule is completed.

options.name: Subscription Schedule.created
options.description: Occurs whenever a new subscription schedule is created.

options.name: Subscription Schedule.expiring
options.description: Occurs 7 days before a subscription schedule will expire.

options.name: Subscription Schedule.released
options.description: Occurs whenever a new subscription schedule is released.

options.name: Subscription Schedule.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a subscription schedule is updated.

options.name: Tax Rate.created
options.description: Occurs whenever a new tax rate is created.

options.name: Tax Rate.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a tax rate is updated.

options.name: Topup Canceled
options.description: Occurs whenever a top-up is canceled.

options.name: Topup Created
options.description: Occurs whenever a top-up is created.

options.name: Topup Failed
options.description: Occurs whenever a top-up fails.

options.name: Topup Reversed
options.description: Occurs whenever a top-up is reversed.

options.name: Topup Succeeded
options.description: Occurs whenever a top-up succeeds.

options.name: Transfer Created
options.description: Occurs whenever a transfer is created.

options.name: Transfer Failed
options.description: Occurs whenever a transfer failed.

options.name: Transfer Paid
options.description: Occurs after a transfer is paid. For Instant Payouts, the event will be sent on the next business day, although the funds should be received well beforehand.

options.name: Transfer Reversed
options.description: Occurs whenever a transfer is reversed, including partial reversals.

options.name: Transfer Updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a transfer's description or metadata is updated.

properties.name: apiVersion
properties.description: The API version to use for requests. It controls the format and structure of the incoming event payloads that Stripe sends to your webhook. If empty, Stripe will use the default API version set in your account at the time, which may lead to event processing issues if the API version changes in the future.

possibleValues.name: Setup Intent.canceled
possibleValues.description: Occurs when a SetupIntent is canceled.

possibleValues.name: Setup Intent.created
possibleValues.description: Occurs when a new SetupIntent is created.

possibleValues.name: Setup Intent.setup_failed
possibleValues.description: Occurs when a SetupIntent has failed the attempt to setup a payment method.

possibleValues.name: Setup Intent.succeeded
possibleValues.description: Occurs when an SetupIntent has successfully setup a payment method.

possibleValues.name: Sigma Scheduled_query_run.created
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a Sigma scheduled query run finishes.

possibleValues.name: Sku Created
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a SKU is created.

possibleValues.name: Sku Deleted
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a SKU is deleted.

possibleValues.name: Sku Updated
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a SKU is updated.

possibleValues.name: Source Canceled
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a source is canceled.

possibleValues.name: Source Chargeable
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a source transitions to chargeable.

possibleValues.name: Source Failed
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a source fails.

possibleValues.name: Source Mandate_notification
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a source mandate notification method is set to manual.

possibleValues.name: Source Refund_attributes_required
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever the refund attributes are required on a receiver source to process a refund or a mispayment.

possibleValues.name: Source Transaction.created
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a source transaction is created.

possibleValues.name: Source Transaction.updated
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a source transaction is updated.

possibleValues.name: Subscription Schedule.aborted
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a subscription schedule is canceled due to the underlying subscription being canceled because of delinquency.

possibleValues.name: Subscription Schedule.canceled
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a subscription schedule is canceled.

possibleValues.name: Subscription Schedule.completed
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a new subscription schedule is completed.

possibleValues.name: Subscription Schedule.created
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a new subscription schedule is created.

possibleValues.name: Subscription Schedule.expiring
possibleValues.description: Occurs 7 days before a subscription schedule will expire.

possibleValues.name: Subscription Schedule.released
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a new subscription schedule is released.

possibleValues.name: Subscription Schedule.updated
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a subscription schedule is updated.

possibleValues.name: Tax Rate.created
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a new tax rate is created.

possibleValues.name: Tax Rate.updated
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a tax rate is updated.

possibleValues.name: Topup Canceled
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a top-up is canceled.

possibleValues.name: Topup Created
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a top-up is created.

possibleValues.name: Topup Failed
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a top-up fails.

possibleValues.name: Topup Reversed
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a top-up is reversed.

possibleValues.name: Topup Succeeded
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a top-up succeeds.

possibleValues.name: Transfer Created
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a transfer is created.

possibleValues.name: Transfer Failed
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a transfer failed.

possibleValues.name: Transfer Paid
possibleValues.description: Occurs after a transfer is paid. For Instant Payouts, the event will be sent on the next business day, although the funds should be received well beforehand.

possibleValues.name: Transfer Reversed
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a transfer is reversed, including partial reversals.

possibleValues.name: Transfer Updated
possibleValues.description: Occurs whenever a transfer's description or metadata is updated.

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

settings.note: Trigger nodes only have common settings (notes, notesInFlow)
